data.name: Robot Daycare
data.detailed_description:
You might like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389870/Artificial_Selection/


Join us on Discord!


Featured DLC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1713330/Robot_Daycare__Art_Book
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1717460/Robot_Daycare__Soundtrack


About the Game

Three perpetually bickering college students team up to create an AI, but will their quest for a robotic child end up as a crash course in parenting or self-defense?

Discover the secret this group of "friends" is hiding and choose if you want to help them forgive and forget... or fuel the conflict.

Features:

  • 2 wildly different endings
  • A heartwarming story about found family
  • Or a terrifying illustration of AI gone wrong
  • 1-2 hours of reading
  • Original Soundtrack

Background:

This is a HD remaster of a popular jam game made within 30 days for NaNoRenO 2019. Aside from minor corrections and improvements, the story has remained unchanged. Thank you to everyone who supported the original and made it possible for me to create this improved version!

data.short_description: A visual novel about raising a cute robot child, which may or may not go horribly wrong. Your choices decide the outcome.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game is rated Teen and up. It deals with sensitive topics such as depression and suicide. Vivid descriptions of gore are optional and can be turned off in the game settings.
